resources.string: This view has a Content Description…
…so the screen reader only reads this

Explore this screen for the types of things the Accessibility Overlay can detect and display.\n\nRed highlighting indicates elements with screen reader issues. If content description displaying is enabled, certain unexpected labelling issues may be more noticeable.
The view behind this text may be important for tab navigation but simply *boop*s when it is focused, not indicating what it is or does.
Tiny button is too small a touch target
This EditText is not labeled by another View nor does it have a hint
